Gereth was an aged gray-haired magician from the City of Coin, Athkatla in Amn in the 14 century DR.
In the , Gereth was a regular shopper at the Adventurer Mart in Athkatlas grand Waukeens Promenade. He searched for salamander dust while being wary of the notorious Cowled Wizards. If anyone asked, Gereth claimed to need the substance of soup. The wizard refused to ask the proprietor â€“ Ribald Barterman for help with salamander dust as they were not on speaking terms after Gereths claim that the shopkeep overcharged him for a bottle of pitch and a bundle of mice tails.
